attributes.action: Make monday a part of the weekend
attributes.additional_details: It is scientifically proven that children retain information better when they have a longer break in between work, the one extra day makes a big difference on how students perform at school and how workers perform at work, therefore, Monday should be a part of the weekend.
attributes.background: Don’t make people work or go to school on Monday and make it a part of the weekend

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when to work are a matter for individual workers and employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require schools to make Friday a part of the school weekend: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614046
